trait.name: Eldritch Sight
text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the shantak's darkvision.

trait.name: Flyby
text: The shantak doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Sight And Smell
text: The shantak has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The shantak has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
text: The shantak has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the shantak's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Unctuous Hide
text: A shantak's hide is very slippery. A rider can dismount a shantak without any penalty to movement speed. If an effect moves the shantak against its will while a creature is on it, the creature must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or fall off the shantak, landing prone in a space within 5 feet of it. If a rider is knocked prone or unconscious while mounted, it must make the same saving throw. In addition, the shantak can attempt to shake off a rider as a bonus action, forcing the rider to make the saving throw to stay mounted.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The shantak makes two attacks. one with its bite and one with its talons.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.

action.name: Talons
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.

action.name: Insane Tittering (Recharge 4-6)
text: The shantak emits a horrific screech. Each non-shantak creature within 60 feet of it that can hear it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be frightened until the end of the shantak's next turn. The shantak can choose to include or exclude its rider when using this action.
